channel.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) doesn't work
channel.description:
Hi. I've just installed Whonix and got this problem: When I launch in Whonix-Workstation TorBrowser it asks me to install it. I press yes, and after long time downloading I've got this: [url=http://postimg.org/image/hbg3ab9zt/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/hbg3ab9zt/snapshot1.png[/img][/url]
Update by Patrick: Changed title.

item.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) doesn't work
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You don’t need my key in kgpg for this. You renewed key in in the system (apt-key). Then apt-get update and apt-get dist-upgrade, so you get latest version of tb-updater. (Currently only available from stable repository - if you used testers or developers repository in meanwhile, it will take a while until those are updated.)

With the tb-updater update comes a new key file:
/usr/share/torbrowser-updater-keys.d/tbb-team.asc

Then Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) (= tb-updater package) will find the key.

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) doesn't work
item.dc:creator: stranger98721
item.description:
Nothing changed. I’ve got the same problem as in first message “GPG download signature could NOT be verified”.

I opened KGpg and there is your key, so I don’t understand what is wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) doesn't work
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
How long did it download?

This shouldn’t persist?

Change your Tor circuit:

Whonix – 12 Dec 19

Control and Monitor Tor

Using a Tor Controller with Whonix ™. onioncircuits. Nyx. Vidalia. View or Change your Tor circuits. Monitor Tor and inspect logs.

Then try again. Or try again later. Should really not be a long issue. Looks more like a network issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) doesn't work
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
1 question per thread please. Not so unrelated ones please.

You unfortunately missed the news.

Specifically:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Deprecated#KEYEXPIRED_Error (was fixed)

Generally:

Whonix – 21 Mar 20

Follow Whonix ™ Developments

It is absolutely crucial to subscribe to and read the latest Whonix ™ news category 'important-news' to stay in touch with ongoing developments. This way users benefit from notifications concerning important security vulnerabilities, potential...

Read full topic
